forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with bright sunshine by the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 55F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
